languages.text: Увы, уровень подготовки бойцов гарнизона был столь низок, что даже личное руководство операцией благословенн{mf|ым|ой} Лорд-капитаном не принесло им победы. Погибая во множестве, солдаты не могли сориентироваться в растительности и хотя бы понять, откуда по ним ведут огонь.

traits.locale_text: Увы, уровень подготовки бойцов планетарной обороны был столь низок, что даже личное руководство операцией благословенн{mf|ым|ой} Лорд-капитаном не принесло им победы. Погибая во множестве, солдаты не могли сориентироваться в растительности и хотя бы понять, откуда по ним ведут огонь.

languages.text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.
languages.original_text: Увы, уровень подготовки бойцов гарнизона был столь низок, что даже личное руководство операцией благословенн{mf|ым|ой} Лорд-капитаном не принесло им победы. Погибая во множестве, солдаты не могли сориентироваться в растительности и хотя бы понять, откуда по ним ведут огонь.

traits.locale_text: Alas, the planetary defense forces were so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

Alas, the planetary defense forces were so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

Alas, the planetary defense forces were so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

languages.text: 狙いははずれ、惑星守備隊があまりにも貧弱だったために、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンが指揮を直接執ったにもかかわらず任務成功には至らなかった。兵たちはジャングルの下生えに慣れないまま、またどこから火に襲われるとも知れぬまま、次々に命を落とした。
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: 狙いははずれ、惑星守備隊があまりにも貧弱だったために、祝福受けしロード・キャプテンが指揮を直接執ったにもかかわらず任務成功には至らなかった。兵たちはジャングルの下生えに慣れないまま、またどこから火に襲われるとも知れぬまま、次々に命を落とした。

languages.text: 遗憾的是，行星驻军的训练水平太差，即使是神皇保佑的舰长大人亲自指挥，也不足以完成任务。一批又一批的士兵在战斗中牺牲，他们在灌木丛中无法分清方向，甚至搞不清楚敌人是从哪边打过来的。
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，行星驻军的训练水平太差，即使是神皇保佑的舰长大人亲自指挥，也不足以完成任务。一批又一批的士兵在战斗中牺牲，他们在灌木丛中无法分清方向，甚至搞不清楚敌人是从哪边打过来的。

languages.text: Por desgracia, el adiestramiento de la guarnición planetaria era tan deficiente que ni siquiera el liderazgo {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán}, que encabezó personalmente la misión, bastó para alcanzar el éxito. Muchos soldados perecieron, pues no sabían orientarse en la espesura ni determinar desde dónde les disparaban.
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, el adiestramiento de la guarnición planetaria era tan deficiente que ni siquiera el liderazgo {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán}, que encabezó personalmente la misión, bastó para alcanzar el éxito. Muchos soldados perecieron, pues no sabían orientarse en la espesura ni determinar desde dónde les disparaban.

languages.text: Leider war die Garnison des Planeten so schlecht ausgebildet, dass selbst der Umstand, dass der gesegnete Lord Captain selbst das Kommando über die Mission übernahm, nicht zum Erfolg führte. Die Soldaten gingen zuhauf unter, fanden sich im Gestrüpp nicht zurecht und wussten oft nicht einmal, von wo sie beschossen wurden.
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: Leider war die Garnison des Planeten so schlecht ausgebildet, dass selbst der Umstand, dass der gesegnete Lord Captain selbst das Kommando über die Mission übernahm, nicht zum Erfolg führte. Die Soldaten gingen zuhauf unter, fanden sich im Gestrüpp nicht zurecht und wussten oft nicht einmal, von wo sie beschossen wurden.

languages.text: Malheureusement, la garnison planétaire était si mal entraînée que même sous les ordres avisés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, la mission se solda par un échec. Les soldats furent abattus en masse, incapables de s'orienter dans la végétation ou même de comprendre d'où venaient les tirs qu'ils essuyaient.
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, la garnison planétaire était si mal entraînée que même sous les ordres avisés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, la mission se solda par un échec. Les soldats furent abattus en masse, incapables de s'orienter dans la végétation ou même de comprendre d'où venaient les tirs qu'ils essuyaient.

languages.text: Gezegen garnizonu o kadar vasıfsızdı ki yüce Lord Kaptan'ın görevin komutasını bizzat devralması bile ne yazık ki başarılı olmaları için yeterli olmadı. Askerler daha nerede olduklarını idrak edemeden ve nereden ateş edildiğini anlayamadan kitleler hâlinde can verdi.
languages.original_text: Alas, the planetary garrison was so poorly trained that even the blessed Lord Captain's personal command of the mission was not enough to make it a success. The soldiers perished in droves, unable to orient themselves in the undergrowth or even determine where they were taking fire from.

traits.locale_text: Gezegen garnizonu o kadar vasıfsızdı ki yüce Lord Kaptan'ın görevin komutasını bizzat devralması bile ne yazık ki başarılı olmaları için yeterli olmadı. Askerler daha nerede olduklarını idrak edemeden ve nereden ateş edildiğini anlayamadan kitleler hâlinde can verdi.
